title: Deep Links Epic

milestone.description:
Features:

General:
- Memory Usage Improvements (part 1)

Chat:
- Activity Center
- New Profile Modal
- Contacts & Profiles
- Identity Verification

Communities:
- Community Portal
- New Join Workflow
- Encrypted Communities
- Import Tool

Wallet:
- Send
  - Initial Bridge integration, allow to send eth/token to best route and advanced view
- Test:
  - Wallet test fully automated and working
- Asset
  - Token view graph
- Keycard 
   - onboarding flow  and login revision
   - Rename Keycard
   - Change PIN
   - Create a 12-digit personal unblocking key (PUK)
   - Create a new Pairing Code
   - UI for the keycard settings in case user has set up a keycard

Automation:
- docker setup to test message reliability & message fetching 
- Use local mailserver in the CI
- Automation: Edit group chat name and cleanup group chat creation scenario
- Automation: Can invite members to a community
- Automation: Can create a contact request
- Automation: Can create a 1 on 1 chat with a mutual contact
- Automation: Can create a 1 on 1 chat with a mutual contactCan delete a message from another member if admin
- Automation: Can create a 1 on 1 chat with a mutual contactCan reply to a message in a community channel
- Wallet scenario: User adds a watch only account
- Wallet scenario: User generates a new account from wallet
- Wallet scenario: User imports a private key
- Wallet scenario: User imports a seed phrase
- Wallet scenario: User deletes a generated account
- Wallet scenario: Can see collectibles for an account
- Wallet scenario: User can edit the default wallet account
- Wallet scenario: User can toggle network and see balances

UI Storybook:
- Initial Storybook app
- Component Events Tracking/logging
- Component properties/models Editing
- Community Portal Section
- Community Portal Card Component
- ProfilePopup Component

C++:
- status-go wrapper: Login
- status-go wrapper: Account Creation
- status-go wrapper: get Chats

body:
### Description

Spec: https://github.com/status-im/specs/blob/feature/url-shema/docs/draft/17-url-scheme.md

Deep links required for MVP:
- [x] User Profile
  - [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/6651 
- [x] Community
  - [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/7892
- [x] Community Channel
- [x] ~~Group Chat ❓ probably not feasible for MVP~~. removed from the scope

Post MVP links ❗ :
- [x] Browser - works correctly from both internal and external link
- [ ] Post in channel
- [ ] Post in group

No needed links:
- [x] Private Chat ❌ - not needed
  - [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/7704 
- [x] Public Chat  ❌ - not needed
- [x] Community Requests  ❌ - not needed

related issues:
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/6612
- [x] update feature specs
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/6302
- [x] test deep links on Windows - Windows tested by Elina
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/7988
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/8001
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/6650
- [x] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/8070
- [ ] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/8027
- [ ] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/7957
- [ ] https://github.com/status-im/status-desktop/issues/9549
- [ ] expose channel link
